content: My dental crown came off while eating
I'm sorry to hear that! Can you tell me if you're experiencing any pain or sensitivity in that area?
Yes, mild pain but very sensitive to cold
Thanks for sharing that. Is the crown itself damaged, or does it seem to be intact?
I told you it came off . What kind of que is this ?
I apologize for the confusion! I appreciate your patience. Have you noticed any swelling or redness around the area where the crown came off?
